desc: Aam is the first brand to cater exclusively to hourglass shapes. With a redesigned waist-to-hip ratio, our pants sit snug at the waist with extra room for curvy hips and thighs. Each piece is responsibly made from soft, natural fabrics, in a factory that is certified for safe working conditions.

layout.text: Waist-nipping styles with room for curvy hips.
Responsibly made in soft, natural fabrics.
